text: Saint-Sulpice-de-Favières is a commune. It is in Île-de-France in the Essonne department in north France. == Geography == Saint-Sulpice-de-Favières is on the river Renarde, south of Paris. == Sights == * The church of Saint-Sulpice, dating from the 13th century and 14th century * The manor house of Segrez, dating from the 18th century == References == Category:Communes in Essonne
title: Saint-Sulpice-de-Favières
